  • Constructor Details

    • Wolf

      public Wolf()
      Calls other constructor with a new AnimalPack with type Wolf.

    • Wolf

      public Wolf(AnimalPack pack)
      Pack is set to the parameter pack. this is added to the pack. Initialises the wolf's variables. - view_distance = 8 - hunger = 0 - energy = 10 - age = 0 - health_points = 12
      Parameters:
      pack - AnimalPack that this wolf will be part of.

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act(World world)
      Description copied from interface: Actor
      The method called whenever the actor needs to simulate actions. The worlds 'current location' is only set at the time when the method is called. Thus, if you use setTile, remove, or delete, the current position does not automatically update. This has multiple implications, e.g., if you want to use World.getSurroundingTiles() after using World.setTile(itumulator.world.Location, java.lang.Object) within the act method, the program will throw an exception. This can be circumvented by updating the current location (World.setCurrentLocation(itumulator.world.Location)) or exclusively using the World methods which accepts a location parameter (by the same name).
      Parameters:
      world - providing details of the position on which the actor is currently located and much more.

    • inSafety

      protected boolean inSafety(World world)
      Safety is defined as either being next to the center of the pack or being surrounded by 3 or more pack members.
      Parameters:
      world - World that this is in
      Returns:
      Whether either safety condition is met.

    • nearestPackMemberLocation

      public Location nearestPackMemberLocation(World world)
      Checks tiles within view_distance to try and find the nearest member of the pack to this.
      Parameters:
      world - World that this is in
      Returns:
      Location of the nearest pack member.

    • goToCave

      public void goToCave(World world)
      Makes this head towards the center of the pack.
      Parameters:
      world - World that this and the pack center is in.

    • createHome

      public void createHome(World world)
      Sets center of pack to a location next to this in world and places a Cave-object there.
      Parameters:
      world - World this is in and where the home will be created.

    • nextToPackMember

      public boolean nextToPackMember(World world)
      Checks if the surrounding tiles in world from the location of this contain a wolf
      Parameters:
      world - World this is in
      Returns:
      Whether there is a pack member on one of the eight tiles around this in world.

    • tryAttack

      public boolean tryAttack(World world)
      Tries to find something to attack within view_distance in the supplied World. If it is close enough to attack then it calls attack(World)-method. Else takes a step toward the found prey.
      Parameters:
      world - The world to find an Object to attack in
      Returns:
      Whether the wolf attacked or went toward something to attack.

    • attack

      public void attack(World world)
      Attacks surrounding tiles with attackTiles(...)-method. If one of the tiles contains a wolf from this wolf's pack, then that tile is removed from the attack list. If a tile contains a wolf from a different pack with less than or exactly 4 health, then that wolf becomes a part of this wolf's pack and is removed from the attack list.
      Parameters:
      world - World this is in and where the attack will take place

    • setPack

      public void setPack(AnimalPack pack)
      Sets this wolf's pack to pack parameter.
      Parameters:
      pack - new pack

    • getPack

      public AnimalPack getPack()
      Returns:
      This wolf's pack.

    • getGrownup

      public boolean getGrownup()
      Specified by:
      getGrownup in class Animal
      Returns:
      Whether this wolf is grown up or not, defined by if age is larger than 3.

    • getFoodValue

      public double getFoodValue()
      Description copied from interface: Edible
      Method signature intended for implementation by anything Edible. Its purpose is to return that things food value, that is how much you get from eating it.
      Returns:
      If grown up returns 4, else returns 2.

      DisplayInformation.

    • getEdibleClasses

      public List<Class<?>> getEdibleClasses()
      Description copied from class: Animal
      Used by eat to make sure instances of Animal-subclasses only eat what they should.
      Overrides:
      getEdibleClasses in class Animal
      Returns:
      List of classes containing the Carcass class.
